name: Culinary Arts Training
description: They offer a FREE hybrid 12 week training program at Mission Language and Vocational School. Class schedule: Tuesdays (Zoom): hours to be shared during orientation Saturdays (in person): 8am - 12pm You will be doing the following: - Cover Phase I: Science of Cannabis Infusions - Learn about the safety and legal industry standards - Learn basic culinary skills and techniques. - Attend off-site field trips to dispensaries and consumption lounges - Mock infusions with lavender, lemon, and other her
